content:
I am a Ph.D. student at Xi’an Jiaotong University, Shaanxi, China. My research interests include event-based (bio-inspired) vision, deep learning, object detection, and pose estimation.
This website mainly serves as a record of my daily life. From time to time, I will share my photographic works and lifeshots here.
In the future, I plan to keep track of recent advances in my research field and share my thoughts through technical blog posts. If you are interested, you are welcome to follow me via RSS. For inquiries, collaboration, or academic discussions, please do not hesitate to contact me via email.
title: Introduction
